item.description:
FOR STEVE GOING @ RALPH'S DINER

TIME: 1-7pm

COST: $25.00 (includes full buffet & entertainment)

Local R & B legend, major friend to WSRS, and all around good guy Steve Going
suffered serious injuries in a motorcycle crash this past April. Recovery has been slow, but he's making great progress. Steve has been a fixture on the local music scene as the leader of Wilbur and the Dukes and has performed dozens of benefit concerts with them for a number of worthy causes.
Now it's time to give back to a guy who never says no to someone in need.

A benefit for Steve will be held rain or shine on Sunday September 14th from 1-7pm at Ralph's Diner on Prescott St. in Worcester Some of the biggest names on the local R&B scene will be there including: James Montgomery, Clutch Crabwell, Shakey Steve & The Blue Cats, Jason James & the Baystate HouseRockers, and of course.... Wilbur & The Dukes!!!!!

Viva Bene is providing the buffet, there'll be a 50/50 raffle, silent and live auctions, and a whole lot more. Tickets are just $25.00 and are available at the door.

Come on down, enjoy the show, and more importantly help a guy who always helps others.
item.how_to_find_us: TBD: please check back for updates
item.name: R & B @ RALPH'S DINER ( Worcester) - A WSRS Benefit Event
